summary: The murder of a wealthy countess, which was erroneously deemed suicide, triggers a chain reaction of brutal killings in the surrounding bay area, as several unscrupulous characters try to take over her large estate.
cast: Claudine Auger|Luigi Pistilli|Claudio Camaso|Anna Maria Rosati|Chris Avram|Leopoldo Trieste|Laura Betti|Brigitte Skay|Isa Miranda|Paola Montenero|Guido Boccaccini|Roberto Bonanni|Giovanni Nuvoletti|Renato Cestiè|Nicoletta Elmi
title: Bahía de sangre
